message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $10,000 to you. Considering its high quality and the benefits it provides, I believe it's an excellent investment for your business or personal use. I am offering this product to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This exclusive offer is valid for the next 24 hours. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with the purchase.
